name: Ijaara Demo
description:
You crossed this forgotten Ijaara facility. You have to find a way to reenable the power system.

This game is an entry into the Godot Wild Jam #35 (Lost Tech).

Disclaimer: I planned six puzzles, but had too much fun making game art. That is why you can only play the first puzzle and not really get into what I planned to be lost tech. I enjoyed making this game as it is very different to games I normally create. I may continue after the jam. It got very short, because of that artsy focus.

Press ESC to free/lock your cursor.

Press LMB to pick up objects or press buttons.

Press RMB to put picked up objects back.

Walk upstairs to leave the game.

You have finished the game, when the doors open.

If you can't read the instructions, I put them online (spoiler): https://pastebin.com/AbgKv9Mh
